è·å–a, bå­—å…¸ä¸­çš„é”®å€¼åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œä¸æ”¹å˜åŸæ¥çš„å…ƒç´ é¡ºåºå»é‡    union_keys = list(a.keys()) + list(b.keys())    new_keys = list(set(union_keys))    new_keys.sort(key=union_keys.index)    for key in new_keys:        print(key)  # '2'        # å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸šåŠ¡éœ€æ±‚ä¿®æ”¹ä¸‹é¢çš„ä»£ç         m = 0        for d in (a, b):            d = d.get(key)            print(d)            if d:                m = m + 1                # å¯¹äºa, bå­—å…¸ä¸­é‡å¤å‡ºç°çš„é”®é‡Œå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨å¯¹åº”å€¼ä¸ç›¸åŒçš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå–å¹¶é›†å¹¶åšæ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢                if m == 2:                    union_codes_list = a.get(key).get(                        'codes') + b.get(key).get('codes')    # list                    union_urls_list = a.get(key).get(                        'urls') + b.get(key).get('urls')                    new_codes = list(set(union_codes_list))                    new_urls = list(set(union_urls_list))                    # setåä¸æ”¹å˜åŸæ¥å…ƒç´ é¡ºåº                    new_codes.sort(key=union_codes_list.index)                    new_urls.sort(key=union_urls_list.index)                    temp[key] = {"codes": new_codes, "urls": new_urls}                else:                    temp[key] = d    return tempperm_dict = reduce(sum_dict, aa)print(perm_dict)

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
